website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for those who prefer a lighter oil without the overpowering olive flavor.
pros: The Amazon brand of olive oil is better used for cooking rather than dressings or bread dip
The flavor is significantly lighter than most extra virgin oils, but still delicious
The bottle is designed with an easy, no-drip mouth
The oil pours out smoothly and with no mess
Use on your skin and hair for all of the olive oil benefits with less of the olive oil smell
cons: The oil doesn't solidify in the fridge, which indicates it could be a blend

customer_reviews.title: Terrible olive oil
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to figure out why my salad dressing tasted "off". Was the garlic old? Was it the oregano? the vinegar? Nope. It turns out this olive oil was/is the culprit. Bitter and an awful after-taste. I bought it because it was an Amazon choice. Very very disappointing. will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pinckney

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely terrible. I would return if it was possible. It tastes like a used sponge, and slightly metallic and bitter. I wish I’d read the reviews before purchasing. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is foul. As other reviewers have mentioned, it has a strange bitter aftertaste that I've never tasted in any olive oil before. I poured it down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes for the product - figured I ...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the product - figured I couldn't go wrong with Amazon's brand on it. It's the most bitter olive oil I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Rick F

customer_reviews.title: Great Olive Oil arrived horribly and dangerously packed
customer_reviews.text: Loved my first bottle of AmazonFresh Extra Virgin Olive Oil. I was running out, so I ordered a new bottle. New Olive Oil arrived today packed in corrugated box with no padding or packing material inside. See picture. New bottle is on left. Original bottle on right. New bottle is badly smashed and scratched on all four sides. I will keep the olive oil because it is easier to pour olive oil from new bottle into old bottle than to return. However--no excuse for this shabby packing. Bottle was slowly leaking. This was a serious problem just waiting to explode.
customer_reviews.author: MBA111

customer_reviews.title: ITALIAN AGAINST MEDITERRANEAN
customer_reviews.text: Italian extra virgin Olive Oil I just revived the Italian extra virgin O O and compared with the Mediterranean blend extra virgin Olive Oil IM N EXPERT IN OLIVE OIL AND COFFEE The Italian flavor is good BUT after taste rancid THE LABEl show date Sep.20. 2019 BUT THIS OIL IS NOT FRESH The Mediterranean blend Taste good and oil is fresh Flavor is light that The Italian I WILL PREFER THE ITALIAN IT IS WAS FRESH SO STICK TO THE MEDITERRANEAN
customer_reviews.author: Jesus delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. My best guess is this oil is two or three years old which is about right. Current harvest olive oil can be a little harsh especially early in the year. This happens routinely with California olive oil's. People haven't figured out all of oil and it's need for time. There's a time and place for immature olive oil but most people really don't like that harsh peppery grassy flavor. Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Mats Hagstrom

customer_reviews.title: Not 100 percent olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Put my trust in Amazon and was disappointed. This oil did not pass the refrigerator test. Pure olive oil gets opaque and solidifies in the refrigerator in a few hours. This oil did not, I'm not a happy camper when an Amazon endorsed product which is touted as 100% oil is definitely not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how it was guaranteed that this was an authentic product - this was critical for me. Am using it to mix C60 for supplementation, which means I take it raw. So I was really pleased with the mouthfeel, and the taste is really nice as well - has that peppery edge to it, but it also has kind of a "grassy" flavor to it that gives it a real fresh flavor. Am quite pleased and plan to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Scirel

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with low expectations ~ "well, I can cook with it" However, nicely surprised by the flavor and use it raw!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Nona

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This has a perfect, more neutral flavor as far as olive oils go. I use it with everything. Well, I did, but I already ran out. So I will buy again soon. I bought some Pompeiian stuff when I ran out of this and I don't like it quite as much.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sagstetter

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this six months ago, it is now so horrible I have throw it out. Ruined a venison salad.....uneatable. Expensive waste of a meal. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Just Outside No Where

customer_reviews.title: A very good evoo
customer_reviews.text: this doesn't quiet have the strong olive taste that I prefer; but it is as good as any I've tried, including many that were a lot more expensive. Also, the bottle has a much appreciated no drip flange in the mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible. Not great.
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side: it isn't rancid, unlike the last variety of Amazon-branded olive oil I purchased (AmazonFresh Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil). It's serviceable enough to use for browning meat and so forth. On the negative side: it still doesn't seem very fresh. There isn't a slight peppery aftertaste you get with even semi-fresh olive oil and there's almost no fruitiness to it. So bland, in fact, that I really wonder if this is pure olive oil. My experiment with Amazon branded olive oils is now at an end. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: SMO

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Like Water
customer_reviews.text: It actually tasted like it had been watered down. Very little olive oil flavor. I should have read the reviews before I bought it.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cellohead

customer_reviews.title: Almost expired when received!  DONT BUY / AMAZON SHOULDN’T SEND OUT EVOO THAT EXPIRES WITHIN MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed when I received a bottle that expires in three months! I though I would try it anyway and i had an identically sized new bottle from Costco (Kirkland Brand) and tried the Amazon (almost expired) olive oil vs the new bottle of Olive Oil I purchased from Costco. The Amazon brand had a burning after taste to it. The Costco was smooth. Putting it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Should not be receiving olive oil that is a use by date 3 months from purchase
customer_reviews.text: While the household does go though a pretty solid amount of olive oil, it's not the primary oil used. The two liter bottle that was purchased arrived today 23 June 2019. It has a best by/use by date of 19 September 2019. Less than three months turn around time for something that is processed and not "fresh" pressed is pretty awful product management to sell at full price. Having not been able to see the use by date was a huge hindrance in this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Mediterranean olive oil in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I've lived in Turkey so I know what a Mediterranean olive oil tastes like. This one is one of the best tasting price/performance Mediterranean olive oil out there!
customer_reviews.author: Soul Reaver

customer_reviews.title: Its not useable
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 both were cloudy and ransid. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bissett

customer_reviews.title: Quality Olive Oil Delivered
customer_reviews.text: When times like these don't let you get out and shop normally, and when some items are harder to find, it's nice to know you can find something like this on Amazon. While the price was outstanding, I was surprised at the quality after being skeptical of finding imported Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil far cheaper than what I normally spend. When you can't find anything else, you go with what you find. Still the color, consistency, smoke-point, and flavor were all in line with what I expect of a daily use EVOO.
customer_reviews.author: Force10JCTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good olive oil for the price
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil isn’t the best tasting olive oil I’ve had, but it’s certainly fine for most cooking purposes. It’s flavor is a little strong and the color is green (which surprised me!). For the price and convenience it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled oil.
customer_reviews.text: I opened product 1st time on 3/6/2020. Label on bottle dates Nov.21, 2020. Oil is rancid, spoiled. Once opened the cap does not snug up so it will leak on return.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: It tastes amazing! Just didn't give 5 stars because it comes in a plastic bottle, which I knew. I transferred it to a glass bottle from my portuguese olive oil and now I can store it longer without losing the great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cristiane Ripari Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Bitter
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because reviews were good and it was Amazon's own brand so I thought they would care about the quality. Just tasted it and it is awful. Bitter taste and thinner than most high quality olive oils. I will stick with my California Olive Ranch from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kohn

customer_reviews.title: First Class World Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: Before we bought this for the first time, we read the good reviews and a review where someone said they had tasted better olive oil in Italy. We've found this to be as good as any olive oil we've tasted, including an assortment of 'boutique olive oils' from small producers. We highly recomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Zalkovsky

customer_reviews.title: Economical olive oil that tastes great
customer_reviews.text: My family of 3 uses olive oil multiple times a day at every meal and in baked breads, so this is a great economical choice for us. We love the taste and smooth buttery flavor and it lasts us about 3 months. Our only suggestion is to offer it in glass bottles - olive oil is better preserved in dark glass and no chemicals would leach from the plastic. And a pore-able spout would be an added benefit.
customer_reviews.author: LGraham

customer_reviews.title: So yum
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I think some people might’ve gotten a different batch than I did because it’s delicious. It’s light & crisp. Great for cooking with or just dipping freshly made bread in it. Great value for the money because the bottle is HUGE.
customer_reviews.author: Rea.

customer_reviews.title: A utilitarian evoo
customer_reviews.text: It's perfectly suited for cooking. This isn't a emerald green cold pressed floral evoo. It's probably a blend of pressings, or maybe just an exhaustive warm 1st press......but, for the money it's fine for utility. I don't like putting heat to an expensive oil, if you are too, this is an acceptable oil. I would say it's along the lines of a Tunisian or a Spanish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Chef BB

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and delicious
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been doing a ton of cooking while in quarantine, and were barreling through our store-bought olive oil which was pretty expensive. This has been a perfect replacement - tastes delicious and is incredibly affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy, slightly peppery and fresh.
customer_reviews.text: I was buying a different brand of EVOO that was very good on subscribe and save, but it suddenly went up in price by a third and I began to shop around for something else. I am very happy I found this oil, I love the taste, and I think the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: ChessieSmile

customer_reviews.title: Almost out of date, bland taste, no good information save your money
customer_reviews.text: Got this today basically tomorrow 2/13/2020, used it smelled it and price is right , dosnt tell you good from bad oil . Tastes bland , EXPIRATION DATE 4/16/2020 JUST OVER 2 MONTHS FOR 17 OZ.!!! IM single and will never use that much oil in two months . Will not buy agsin and since i used discover points wont return. Trash it after or put in animals food
customer_reviews.author: Gk

customer_reviews.title: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil only!
customer_reviews.text: In the first bullet remark they say, "A smooth blend with subtle notes of pepper and herbs". The bottle and our taste buds say that this in 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil with no note of pepper and herbs. It's very good Olive Oil but no Italian taste. We will use it and have added our own Herbs & Spices but now have to wait a few weeks for the flavor to mingle.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN HEMINGWAY

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil for making hand made goat milk soaps. Fresh, good quality oils are essential for the process and this oil has performed very well. Will be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda S.

customer_reviews.title: Its not vergin olive oil
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like the taste of this product i would love to try another one
customer_reviews.author: nazek alnijdawi

customer_reviews.title: good everyday oil
customer_reviews.text: This is an everyday olive oil. Not enough flavor for a finishing oil, but that isn't expected at this price. Not having found its equal in my local grocery stores, I have now reordered it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Wirth

customer_reviews.title: This is really good olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Very smooth with a nice silky and tasteful finish. Not harsh or bitter like some others. The bottle is small though. Going to buy it again, but look for a larger size. But, it is good!
customer_reviews.author: B. Battibulli

customer_reviews.title: More than adequate for most applications
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good oil for everyday use and I use it almost every day . If you have need for a specialty olive oil , this might not fill the bill . I would suggest experimenting a little.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Kale

customer_reviews.title: A really nice olive oil
customer_reviews.text: A really nice olive oil. Just the right taste, not too strong like some olive oils. I use it mainly in salads. I also use it in soap making and it makes an exceptional olive oil bar. thank you for making this an affordable oil!
customer_reviews.author: Winglet

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many types of olive oil, and this is as good, or better than all, including the imported oils. Comment: Olives come from many orchards and countries, and quality can vary per bottle. Anyone who purchased olive oil will know this. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick A. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Organic extra virgin, very bland. Slight aftertaste (not old but not fresh either), not a great value size for cost. Overall it did the trick, as I needed more oil, but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: TheGuy

customer_reviews.title: Expired best buy date received TWICE including the return replacement
customer_reviews.text: Received on Subscribe and Save and arrived with expiration 7/4/20. Filled return with this info and a free replacement was sent WITH SAME EXPIRED DATE of 7/4/20. Now it does not allow the return label be filled so I am just going to email for a credit and order a different brand than Amazon Basics.
customer_reviews.author: TrishL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very aromatic. I'm no expert on olive oil, but I do like the taste. I use this to make salad dressing and I enjoy the taste very much. The price is right. Since I'm not picky about olive oil (so long as it's the real thing), I can't really justifying paying more.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Fok

customer_reviews.title: gooood stuff
customer_reviews.text: quality is very good. im married to a Spaniard so we only use olive oil on everything. Trader Joe's is good, Kirkland is good. This Amazon is really good. A bit more expensive by about 5 dollars. We always have several bottles around so we don't run out...ever.
customer_reviews.author: Norman L. Halbert

customer_reviews.title: The real thing
customer_reviews.text: Up until I bought this oil I never believed a lable. I do bielive this is the best in the world. At the very least as good as the best I say this because I have not tried every brand in the world.
customer_reviews.author: wes doyle

customer_reviews.title: It’s olive oil
customer_reviews.text: It’s looks and tastes like olive oil. To my middle-class American palate, it’s fine. I wish the bottle weren’t so tall because it doesn’t fit in my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: This is not EVOO. I used in a salad ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not EVOO. I used in a salad dressing and after 24 hours of refrigeration, it was still a liquid. Olive oil is monounsaturated fat and becomes solid at refrigerated temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Glatter

customer_reviews.title: I was very amazed by the quality
customer_reviews.text: Great true flavor, color and taste. I use it on all my cooked foods, salads and dressings I also make a plate of e. v, olive oil ,chopped garlic,oregano,salt and pepper , dunk homemade crusty bread chunks.
customer_reviews.author: giancarlo devito

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really expected more from this product. There really isn't much taste - it almost seems like it's Wesson oil, not premium Italian extra virgin olive oil. I wish I hadn't gotten such a big bottle, because I hate to throw things away. A real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Redhed66

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at the buttery flavor, I have paid so much for supposedly high grade olive oils but they did not add the same texture and flavor that this one does. I actually just needed something in a pinch and gave this a try, but my boutique sellers are now out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for subscribe and save customers.
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten several of these bottles so far and the flavor has been consistent. Very similar in taste to what you'd find at a big box store with the convenience of subscribe and save. Packaging could be a little better as most of the time the bottle is pretty banged up. I've never had any leaks though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Norton

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent olive oil. Works well in cooking and direct on to salads and other fresh foods. Great price and very convenient having it delivered through subscribe and save. All around a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked a glass bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked a glass bottle. It is pricey and should for health reasons give you a glass bottle. I tried to see if it was a glass bottle before I got it but it didn’t say. Or I didn’t find it. I bought two thinking they were probably glass. Surprise surprise
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: All Oilve Oil is not created equal!
customer_reviews.text: All Oilve Oil is not created equal. This is a very good quality Oil Oilve. Very large bottle. I poured some into another bottle and added fresh ginger, garlic and haberno peppers - awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Juicy

customer_reviews.title: Oil.  I like Oil.  Makes everything slippery.
customer_reviews.text: I used to squeeze each individual olive until the oil came out. Took me years to make a bottle. I found this oil is already squeezed into a bottle, saving me years of time. You should also purchase some pre-squeezed olive oil in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: exellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt expecting that much because of the price but it has a robust taste that is surprisly good.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P

customer_reviews.title: Not as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I normally like the Costco version but thought I would give this a try. The flavor does not seem to be as rich to me and the viscosity is less than the Costco oil which we have enjoyed. It is still good but not as good as hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Delicious.
customer_reviews.text: I like olive oil that tastes like olives. This hits the mark. A wonderful blend. Fresh tasting and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: JJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good tasting oil
customer_reviews.text: Great value and good tasting oil. Wish is came in glass bottles so it would have a longer shelf life. Being in the light weight plastic bottles drastically limits its shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as expected from Amazon, heavy like Sicilian oil not as the Tuscan one
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Perticucci

customer_reviews.title: Simply not good olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting great olive oil, but the quality of this product had me wondering if it was olive oil. The only thing nice about this product is the cost, but buyer beware. It is straight up vegetable oil without any of that wonderful olive oil fragrance, texture, or flavor. Don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: lareid

customer_reviews.title: Cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: Cheap stuff but the quality isn’t there. It doesn’t have the unique extra virgin flavor it’s supposed to have. Would need to try amazon brand more carefully
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: It’s olive oil...
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. Nothing special about olive oil but I’m grateful it always arrives undamaged and I don’t need to lug it home from the store.
customer_reviews.author: sub-contractor

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give amazon’s olive oil a shot, not sure what to expect as far as quality. I have been so impressed (I’m on my third bottle). The oil is vibrant green and the taste is fruity as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering it and I have no complaints. I divided the bottle and used half for cooking and the other half I use in my 4c hair. (Don't knock it till you try it) I will be purchasing again very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: AmazonFresh Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil is good..
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this Italian Extra virgin olive oil very much..It is greenish oil with a peppery finish and adds a very nice layer of flavor. I will buy it again..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good olive oil
customer_reviews.text: We are Italian and so olive oil is a staple in our home. Thought I’d give this one a try and it is great! Great value for the price and a good tasting olive oil! It is now on my subscribe and save order...it’s that good!
customer_reviews.author: terrie azzarello

customer_reviews.title: Love the container - not glass
customer_reviews.text: Having broken a bottle of olive oil all over my kitchen I was happy to find this is a hard plastic. So far it tastes great in everything I have used it in - shrimp dish and chicken dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great EVOO!
customer_reviews.text: This is very good EVOO for the price. I cancelled my olive oil club membership and now have this on auto ship.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C.

customer_reviews.title: Not extra virgin
customer_reviews.text: Scam, not extra virgin. Disappointing the Fresh/Amazon brand are trying to trick customers with their own branded products. I am never buying anything again that has their brand.
customer_reviews.author: FZ

customer_reviews.title: Great tip. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: An Italian woman once told me this was the only one to use. I had no idea there was such a difference. There is! It pays to listen to people when you love their cooking. Great tip!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best EVOO I've tried
customer_reviews.text: It was totally unexpected but this was one of the best OO blends I've ever tried. Nutty but sweet at the same time. Perfect spice. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great Olive Oil - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil is great for grilling and at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: NYSS

customer_reviews.title: Just as good
customer_reviews.text: Fresh. Flavor is just as good as the name brands. Good for the price
customer_reviews.author: ncr515

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price - just not great
customer_reviews.text: Truly lives up to 4 stars. It's great to cook with but the taste is not as full-bodied as more expensive olive oil. That being said, I will still buy this one because it is a fantastic price! I subscribe and save to save even more money.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really sure what to expect. Store olive oils have a bitter taste, so I normally purchase expensive brands. I was very impressed by this olive oil! The oil is smooth with no bitterness. It has a good flavor. I will be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: Superbizmom

customer_reviews.title: Med Blend mmmm!
customer_reviews.text: There are some mixed reviews, our taste buds vary. “Meh” was my original reaction, but a great spicy aftertaste kicked in. ***Update, third time ordered, my favorite, ordering in larger bottle now. This is for the Med Blend. Italian and organic are short of mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: Oddities Online

customer_reviews.title: This olive oil is fantastic for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has done it again, they entered another market, with a high quality, low price item. This olive oil is fantastic for the cost. it's spicy and bitter as evoo should taste.
customer_reviews.author: R.P.M,

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, and for the price you can't beat it. Watch the video about the farm where the olives are cultivated, it's pretty interesting.
customer_reviews.author: RykerOut

customer_reviews.title: Use less, than usual!
customer_reviews.text: Has a wonderful flavor, and is great for homemade vinaigrettes.
customer_reviews.author: Kon and Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking oil!
customer_reviews.text: Good olive oil for cooking. The price was fair & Shipped on time as well. Not a high enough quality oil for finishing or bread dipping. Just a nice basic cooking oil.
customer_reviews.author: ahigh

customer_reviews.title: Good olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and can't beat the price for delivery to my door step. Seems lighter in color and consistency than other olive oil I've used, but tastes great. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: 100% Olive Oil - Really Happy With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am used to olive oil from my brother's farm, grown, pressed, packaged and sold. I ran out and won't see him for a while and bought this from Amazon. While not 100‰ the same, it is a strong contender. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: raizel629

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a lot of my cooking. It's light and flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Good oil for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of this oil it is on the peppery side but very smooth. It is not a single origin olive oil, it is a blend from various Mediterranean countries. I use it to cook, in dressings and just drizzle it on various foods. It’s a good oil for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bottle :(
customer_reviews.text: I hate that this is in plastic. I will never buy this again. I’d pay more if it came in glass.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina421

customer_reviews.title: Cheap with excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I always use olive oil on my food and I am using this particular olive oil for first time. I love it and it’s much cheaper than regular stores price.
customer_reviews.author: Saroj Chand

customer_reviews.title: WORKS FOR US
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Amazon olive oil for about 8 months and find it tastes just fine. Perhaps not "gourmet" for some palets, but we have no complaints for either cooking or salads.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of buying small bottles from the grocery stores, and as much uses I use it for a bottle of this size came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Newson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I'd get it if I can't get Kirkland's cold pressed extra virgen.
customer_reviews.text: I personally like Kirkland's Brad because of it price and taste. However this brand was almost like it. It's more expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: o_o_hello

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tasting olive oil for the price
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great olive oil! Fragrant and tasty
customer_reviews.text: This is great olive oil. Tastes really good in salads and I have cooked and fried with it.
customer_reviews.author: The Greek Owl Girl

customer_reviews.title: and they have never been wrong as far as I am concerned
customer_reviews.text: I don’t just love the flavor but I’m used to home made Italian this is gonna make me feel like a culinary art is not going to be lost to something in a can. That’s great
customer_reviews.author: Marko B.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious olive oil!!!
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil has the same great taste you would expect from small growers and exorbitant prices. No need to stock multiple oils to keep the cost down. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Bunker

customer_reviews.title: HAVE A EVOOO ME
customer_reviews.text: GREAT RAN OUT TRIED THIS EVOO. IT WAS CHEAPER...AND TASTES GOOD...WILL KEEP BUYING IT. TRY IT....YOU'LL LIKE IT.....
customer_reviews.author: Shmatty

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to have come across this Amazon brand of olive oil. I like the taste and use it every day in my cooking.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything but dipping
customer_reviews.text: good olive oil for salads, marinades, and cooking. Although, I would suggest a higher quality olive oil for dipping bread in
customer_reviews.author: Bobert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste, mild but flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, will definitely buy again! Love it's organic and doesn't cost a fortune. Taste awesome, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazon EVO
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil was well worth the cost because it compared to many other store brands for much less cost.
customer_reviews.author: rusty rick

customer_reviews.title: Everyday olive oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday olive oil but would probably use a fancy olive oil for dipping bread or drizzling over a finished dish.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonNana

customer_reviews.title: Pure olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Hoping product is pure virgin pressed olive oil by Amazon reputation alone, there is know why to know
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mueller

product_meta.title: AmazonFresh Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 68 Fl Oz (2L)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Italian| Size:67.63 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)This Olive Oil imparts light but flavorful notes of spicy pepper and fresh herbs into your dishes. It's great for cooking - it even stands up well to high frying temperatures. Recommended for dipping,creating dressing and marinades and drizzling over finished dishes.
feature_bullets: A smooth blend with subtle notes of pepper and herbs
Use for cooking, grilling, and in finishing dishes
One 2-liter plastic bottle of Extra Virgin Olive Oil
Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase. 1-877-485-0385
If you like Colavita Premium Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil, we invite you to try AmazonFresh Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil
